CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): A.1.8.2, documentlist (100AN)
E2B (R3): C.1.6.1.r.1 Documents Held by Sender User Guidance: A description of the documents held by the sender relevant to this ICSR (e.g. clinical records, hospital records, autopsy reports, ECG strips, chest X-ray, or photographs) should be listed individually in this data element. Conformance Optional, but required if C.1.6.1 is ‘true’. Data Type: 2000AN OID: None Value Allowed: Free text
CustomField.inlineHelpText: User Guidance: A description of the documents held by the sender relevant to this ICSR (e.g. clinical records, hospital records, autopsy reports, ECG strips, chest X-ray, or photographs) should be listed individually in this data element.
CustomField.label: List of Documents Held
